job.title: Web Developer and Software Engineer - ASP.NET C#
job.description: pAre you interested in helping to transform the way people communicateppbrppMultimedia Solutions is a cuttingedge digital consulting firm focused on revolutionizing the way our Fortune 2000 clients reach their clients As a Website Developer and Software Engineer your responsibilities will include designing developing and maintaining software application components using C programming language ASPNET AJAX ModelView Controller MVC JQuery Web Services XML XSD XSLT etcppbrppIf you embrace a closeknit small business environment and want to have a big impact on the firm our clients and your career please read onppbrppstrongnbspSoftware Developer BenefitsstrongpulliOpportunity to work on web development projects for Fortune 2000 companiesliliOpportunity to work on the Multimedia Solutions Digital Experience platform visionliliWork with the latest programming technologies on websites mobile computing content management and social medialiliCompetitive salary with benefits bonus opportunities and trainingnbspPlus you get to work with really smart peopleliliA culture founded on the principles of excellence respect accountability integrity enjoyment and diversityliliThe exciting and ideal work environment of feeling part of a startup but yet in a company with a solid 28year reputationliliHealth and Dental BenefitsliliH1 Sponsorshiplili401K PlanliulpbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliCliliNETliliASPNETliliASPNET MVCliliRazorliliUmbraco CMS ornbspother NET based CMS exposurenbspliliJavaScript  AJAXliul
